meanings.definition: A person who enters or takes part in a competition or contest.
meanings.sent1: The entrant in the race was determined to win.
meanings.sent2: The entrant submitted their entry form for the contest.
meanings.sent3: The entrant brought a lucky charm to the competition.
meanings.sent4: The entrant was a force to be reckoned with on the track.
meanings.sent5: The entrant's competitive spirit shone brightly during the event.

meanings.definition: A person who enters a place or joins a group.
meanings.sent1: The new entrant to the club was warmly welcomed by everyone.
meanings.sent2: The entrant walked confidently into the building.
meanings.sent3: The entrant quickly found their way to the meeting room.
meanings.sent4: The entrant seamlessly blended in with the rest of the team.
meanings.sent5: The entrant's arrival brought a breath of fresh air to the group.
